name: RunLocal
headline: The On-Device AI Development Platform
description: RunLocal helps engineering teams discover, optimize, evaluate and deploy the best on-device AI model for their use case.

founders.name: Ismail Salim, Founder/CEO
founders.description: CEO of Neuralize. Previously a product manager at the forefront of on-device AI/ML deployment, shipping AR/VR applications at Meta and the first AI video codec at Deep Render.

founders.name: Ivan Chan, Founder/CTO
founders.description: CTO of Neuralize. Previously a software engineer at Marshall Wace (Europe's largest hedge fund) building an internal AI platform for developers and optimizing low latency streaming systems.

founders.name: Ciarán O' Rourke, Founder/CSO
founders.description: CSO of Neuralize. Previously an ML performance engineer optimizing cross-platform on-device inference at Deep Render and scientific simulations at the Irish Centre for High-End Computing.

## Bespoke support
Need more than testing and evaluation? We also support with model-specific optimizations (inc. layer-level changes) and debugging performance issues.
Need more than testing and evaluation? We also support with model-specific optimizations (inc. layer-level changes) and debugging performance issues.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VniUvkDoKkOIW0bAEzgRQChzVJQ.jpeg)
Oleksii Tretiak
Head of R&D at Skylum
RunLocal helped us reduce the time required for model conversion and optimization from weeks to days, making it possible to assess model quality and performance at scale on different hardware and operating systems. With a high degree of integration with our codebase, easy-to-read infographics, outstanding support, and continuous improvement of optimization techniques, RunLocal is a reliable contributor to our model deployment process. 
RunLocal helped us reduce the time required for model conversion and optimization from weeks to days, making it possible to assess model quality and performance at scale on different hardware and operating systems. With a high degree of integration with our codebase, easy-to-read infographics, outstanding support, and continuous improvement of optimization techniques, RunLocal is a reliable contributor to our model deployment process. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kdWrYYoRcNShv1sZNq47DnRdm5E.png)

generated_description:
### RunLocal: On-Device AI Made Easy

Founded in 2024 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch S24, RunLocal is carving out a niche in the complex world of on-device AI. Based in San Francisco, this compact yet dynamic team of three is focused on developing an innovative on-device AI development platform. Their mission is simple: to help engineering teams discover, optimize, evaluate, and deploy the best AI models tailored to their specific use cases.

**What Does RunLocal Do?**

RunLocal simplifies the deployment of on-device AI in applications, allowing companies to ship superior models faster without the usual headaches. The platform provides robust tools for model experimentation across a variety of devices—think iOS, Android, MacOS, and Windows. This means you can test optimizations efficiently and make informed decisions rather than relying on outdated DIY methods or spreadsheets.

Their key offerings include:

- **Model Experimentation**: Faster, more comprehensive testing of model optimizations across multiple platforms.
- **Bespoke Optimization Support**: Beyond mere testing, RunLocal offers specific support for model optimizations, including layer-level adjustments and performance debugging.
- **Device Representation**: They acquire and maintain a diverse range of devices that reflect the users you aim to serve. This saves engineering teams precious time and resources that would otherwise be spent maintaining their own device library.
- **Ease of Decision-Making**: With their tailored evaluation tools, navigating quality data and performance benchmarks becomes far more manageable, enabling clearer insights into trade-offs.

**The Foundational Team and Support**

At the helm of this ambitious startup is David Lieb, a Group Partner, ensuring that the company stays well-connected and knowledgeable within the industry. While currently a small operation, the focused expertise of the team is crucial for addressing the challenging demands of machine-learning deployment in real-world applications.

**Why Choose RunLocal?**

The platform is rapidly gaining traction because of its proven ability to drastically reduce model conversion and optimization times—testimonials highlight reductions from weeks down to days. This efficiency not only accelerates the deployment process but also enhances model quality and performance across diverse hardware and software environments.

In short, if you’re in the business of deploying on-device AI and seeking a reliable partner to streamline your development process and enhance model performance, RunLocal should be on your radar. You can explore more about their offerings and book a demo at [RunLocal.ai](https://runlocal.ai).

---

Whether you're a startup or an established player in AI, RunLocal provides the tools you need to innovate faster and deploy smarter. The era of cumbersome deployment processes is over—embrace the simplicity and efficiency that RunLocal offers!
